title: projects/ products
text: this is where the projects the scholars & reus have completed will be loaded. either in photos or links or whatever with a description.

title: Long Term Intertidal Monitoring on Yellow Island A Black In Marine Science X The Nature Conservancy Program
text:
This is the program landing page.
There will be: - photos of the island. - icons for each involved org that link to their sites. - mission/ purpose statement for the program. - meet the mentors (matt & i) - 2022 program (cohort photo that is clickable to take you to the 2022 landing page) - 2023 program (cohort photo that is clickable to take you to the 2023 landing page) - social media handles/ spotify playlists/ something light if necessary

title: mentorship
text:
this is where the purpose/ mission of me, bims, tnc, ddcsp will be with quotes from folks from the program.
the meet a scientist folks can also be here.

title: About
text: This is where the purpose of the program will land - add photos and links to the partner sites. There can also be a blurb about Matt & I if necessary.
